page.title: 13MEDIA
page.content: Nationwide television and radio programmes are received in almost all households and Radio Cumbria broad- casts local news and events. Favourite programmes of adults are Emmerdale Farm and East-Enders. National newspapers and magazines are delivered daily. The Daily Express is the most popular newspaper followed by the Daily Mail and the Sun. The most popular Sunday paper is the Sunday Express followed by the News of the World and the Sunday Post. The local newspaper is the Cumberland & Westmorland Herald published in Penrith, a majority of families take this paper. The Cumberland News based in Carlisle also covers the district.
